Question: In 2003, this person returned to television, starring in the NBC comedy, Whoopi, which was canceled after one season.
Hints: In 2009, this person won the Daytime Emmy Award for Outstanding Talk Show Host for her role on The View.
On December 18 through 20, 2009, this person performed in the Candlelight Processional at Epcot in Walt Disney World.
This person's recent ancestors migrated north from Faceville, Georgia, Palatka, Florida, and Virginia.
